pull.title: build: fix make deploy for arm64-darwin
pull.body:
Fix make deploy for arm64-darwin

Accidentally [closed](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21555) the PR

events.message:
build: mac_alias 2.2.0

Fix make deploy for arm64-darwin

Tested ACK b353633bf488fbd89b66f6c534d5f0f676c9cf6d.

The `mac_alias` fix is https://github.com/al45tair/mac_alias/commit/2f96a9b897f75ff2c38eaa0efd2e40d39ae5f9ba which is in release 2.2.0.

Without this `make deploy` fails:
```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/joao/Projects/bitcoin/./contrib/macdeploy/macdeployqtplus", line 22, in <module>
    from ds_store import DSStore
  File "/Users/joao/Projects/bitcoin/depends/arm-apple-darwin20.3.0/native/lib/python3/dist-packages/ds_store/__init__.py", line 1, in <module>
    from .store import DSStore, DSStoreEntry
  File "/Users/joao/Projects/bitcoin/depends/arm-apple-darwin20.3.0/native/lib/python3/dist-packages/ds_store/store.py", line 8, in <module>
    import mac_alias
  File "/Users/joao/Projects/bitcoin/depends/arm-apple-darwin20.3.0/native/lib/python3/dist-packages/mac_alias/__init__.py", line 1, in <module>
    from .alias import *
  File "/Users/joao/Projects/bitcoin/depends/arm-apple-darwin20.3.0/native/lib/python3/dist-packages/mac_alias/alias.py", line 16, in <module>
    from . import osx
  File "/Users/joao/Projects/bitcoin/depends/arm-apple-darwin20.3.0/native/lib/python3/dist-packages/mac_alias/osx.py", line 424, in <module>
    _statfs = libc['statfs$INODE64']
  File "/opt/homebrew/Cellar/python@3.9/3.9.4/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.9/lib/python3.9/ctypes/__init__.py", line 392, in __getitem__
    func = self._FuncPtr((name_or_ordinal, self))
AttributeError: dlsym(0x100a45810, statfs$INODE64): symbol not found
make: *** [Bitcoin-Core.dmg] Error 1
```

issue.title: [Build] [Depends] Unify macOS deploy target
issue.body:
This is a companion to #2272 that focuses on on the `.dmg` creation aspect of macOS builds (ie, `make deploy`). The following upstream PRs are backported here:
 - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15175
 - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16477
 - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20422
 - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20890
 - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21658

Also worth mentioning: This drops support for MacPorts entirely, which has been antiquated and un-maintained for quite some time, and never actually used by any PIVX macOS build doc.

issue.title: build: Update native_mac_alias, Remove big sur patch file in qt recipe
Installation via Bitcoin-Core.dmg is broken on macOS (Apple Silicon)
issue.body:
System: macOS Big Sur 11.4 (20F71), chip Apple M1.

On master (c609e10545492aba480ff17aff7eefc13a0b5cd8), after succesfull `make deploy` (without depends), the app installed from `Bitcoin-Core.dmg` fails to run.

`src/qt/bitcoin-qt` works flawlessly.

issue.title: [Upstream] [Build] [Depends] Unify macOS deploy target
issue.body:
> This is a companion to #2272 that focuses on on the `.dmg` creation aspect of macOS builds (ie, `make deploy`). The following upstream PRs are backported here:
> 
> * [build: Drop macports supportbitcoin/bitcoin#15175](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15175)
> * [build: skip deploying plugins we dont use in macdeployqtplusbitcoin/bitcoin#16477](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16477)
> * [build: mac deployment unificationbitcoin/bitcoin#20422](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20422)
> * [doc: Add explicit macdeployqtplus dependencies install stepbitcoin/bitcoin#20890](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20890)
> * [build: fix make deploy for arm64-darwinbitcoin/bitcoin#21658](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21658)
> 
> Also worth mentioning: This drops support for MacPorts entirely, which has been antiquated and un-maintained for quite some time, and never actually used by any PIVX macOS build doc.

from https://github.com/PIVX-Project/PIVX/pull/2400
follow-up to https://github.com/PRCYCoin/PRCYCoin/pull/136
